The chunk is situated under the "Issues" section of the document, which addresses potential problems when working with movie textures in Panda. This section follows detailed instructions on loading, controlling, synchronizing audio, and handling non-power-of-two texture sizes for movies. It highlights performance considerations and compatibility issues, such as limited support for certain encoding formats like DV.

Issues

The video texture works by decoding on a frame by frame basis and copying into the texture buffer. As such, it is inadvisable to use more than a few high res video textures at the same time.

Certain encoding formats do not work. So far, DV format has been determined incompatible with Panda.
